intro lead: Welcome to lib.reviews! We're building a free and open platform for reviewing absolutely anything, in any language.
intro message:
Why? Because we believe the world's reviews should be organized by a community, not for profit, without ads, and with a strong commitment to integrity and quality. We also believe in decoupling reviews from people offering you the thing that's being reviewed, because combining them creates a conflict of interest.

Right now we're working on the code. Here are a few things you can do:
to do list:
• Work on any of our open issues
  • Liberate your existing reviews using freeyourstuff.cc
  • Join our discussion list and share your thoughts about this project
find us on: You can find us on GitHub, on Twitter and on IRC (#libreviews on irc.freenode.net).
